pages.text: $(li)The Infernal Forge is the strongest melee weapon, but this one is not only a weapon, it is a Pickaxe too.$(br)$(li)With right click you can invoke a short range area that inflicts 7 hearts of damage.

pages.name: Infernal Forge
pages.text: The Infernal Forge can only be obtained defeating the $(l:patchouli:weapons/blood_sprayer)Netherite Monstrosity$(/l).
